arStrings.szText: Each point of Fury you generate while at Maximum Fury grants your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1  * Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c}.
Each point of Fury you generate while at Maximum Fury grants your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill  {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
